title: no_excel_files
message: One or more files you uploaded are not Microsoft Excel files. Please reload the application and ensure all uploads have '.xlsx' file extensions.

title: protocol_metadata_error
message: This file does not have the standard MarineGEO "protocol_metadata" sheet. The sheet may have been deleted, renamed, or the first column of names may have been changed.  You can find MarineGEO spreadsheets  at https://marinegeo.github.io/modules.html

title: sample_metadata_error
message: This file does not have the standard MarineGEO "sample_metadata" sheet. The sheet may have been deleted, renamed, or the first column of names may have been changed.  You can find MarineGEO protocols at https://marinegeo.github.io/modules.html

title: data_entry_date_error
message: One or more files you uploaded has invalid data entry date values in the "protocol_metadata" sheet. Please ensure "data_entry_day", "data_entry_month", and "data_entry_year" all have valid values.

title: site_error
message: One or more files you uploaded has an invalid "site_code" value. If you do not know your approved site code, or have not been assigned one, please contact "marinegeo@si.edu".

title: workbook_version_error
message: This file does not have a valid workbook version recorded in the "protocol_metadata" sheet of your submission. Make sure the first column of values weren't renamed or deleted.

title: invalid_workbook_version
message: This file does not have a valid workbook version. Acquire updated MarineGEO spreadsheets at https://marinegeo.github.io/modules.html
